Chapter Previous Next

struct GOBINPUT

UBYTE KeyChar; Last keyboard character pressed.
UBYTE MouseButLeft; State of LEFT mouse button.
UBYTE MouseButMiddle; State of MIDDLE mouse button.
UBYTE MouseButRight; State of RIGHT mouse button.
POINT MousePos; Mouse position.
UBYTE OldMouseButLeft; Old state of LEFT mouse button.
UBYTE OldMouseButMiddle; Old state of MIDDLE mouse button.
UBYTE OldMouseButRight; Old state of RIGHT mouse button.
POINT OldMousePos; Last mouse position.

#include "GOBInput.h"
